mapper.select: select t2.*,t3.name as reviewer_name,t1.status,t1.title,t1.content,t1.keywords from user_article t1 right join reviewer_replay t2 ON t1.article_id = t2.article_id right join userinfo t3 on t2.reviewer_id = t3.user_id where t1.article_id = #{articleId} and t1.status < 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewer_replay ( reviewer_id, article_id, replay, replay_time ) VALUES ( #{reviewerId} , #{articleId} , #{replay} , now())
